item.title: Oopsie Bugs: A Cheery Guide to Embracing QA Slip-Ups!
item.description: So, you found a bug that slipped through the cracks? No biggie! We are all in this together. Let's turn those Oopsie Bugs moments into valuable lessons and sprinkle a bit of fun into the QA world
